meanings.definition: Arranged in an orderly or tidy way
meanings.sent1: The neater stack of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps her desk neater than anyone else in the office.
meanings.sent3: The neater rows of vegetables in the garden made it easier to harvest.
meanings.sent4: The neater lines of code in the program reduced errors significantly.
meanings.sent5: His neater closet organization system saved him time every morning.
